name: Bouldering
desc: This is something I only really got into recently. Bouldering is unique, it combines your typical strength training with puzzle solving. At a bouldering gym, you will frequently see people staring at a route and motioning with their hands on how to get up.
Bouldering is the literal essence of "getting back up after you fall", it is very humbling while still being extremely rewarding when you finally send a route.
